_header: Thou shendest me sore with thy looking
Note: For a closely related text see 5863.
_description: Debate between the Heart and the Eye — four couplets in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.First Lines:
Þu schendest me sore with þi lokingtÞu schendest
                    þe more with þi þenghking…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…Lat eyȝe wepin for his loking& lat herte repenten
                    for wikke þenking
NLS18721.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild. 
             “A Homiletic Debate between Heart and Eye.” 
             Modern Language Notes
         30 (1915): 197-8: 198.
